name: molded glaze
description: It is a molded glaze used for firing the glaze hammer. Steel exteriors are damaged at launch and can not be reused.

name: iron electromagnetic projectile
description: A rod for electromagnetic projectile guns made of iron. It is easy to make, but it is fragile compared to other EM projectiles, so it lacks flight distance and stability.

name: steel electromagnetic projectile
description: A rod for electromagnetic projectile guns made of steel. It is a standard projectile with stable performance.

name: superalloy electromagnetic projectile
description: A rod for electromagnetic projectile guns made of superalloy. It is a projectile with high performance due to its excellent electrical and chemical properties.

name: electromagnetic projectile magazine
description: A magazine dedicated to the improved electromagnetic projectile gun. You can load up to 20 rods.
